channel.title: autohotkey on Coding notes
channel.description: Recent content in autohotkey on Coding notes

item.title: Auto hot key to customize keyboard strokes
item.description: Documentation https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/Hotkeys.htm#Intro Highlights Maximum two keys combinations. Create < and > Create a script for alt+z to be < lessThan.ahk !z:: Send, < return Create a script for alt+x to be > greaterThan.ahk !x:: Send, > return Double click the files (once AHK is installed) and that’s it.
